::Spears::

She sighed and walked out towards the entrance of the ship.  Sh=
e 
walked outside and saw Lunarpine. "Hey, Lunarpine, we got incoming 
maxi=
mal.  With luck he's bringing stuff for us to use to repair the 
ship.  So =
when he gets here, don't blast his face off."

She  sat on the ramp at the =
entrance and looked out and around the 
ship.  She sighed, she was feeling =
like salvaging the Ark was an 
impoosable task and could never be done.  Sh=
e wanted it to come true 
just as much as the next maximal.  But there was =
just too much damage.
